titleStmt.title: Querees propounded by the Protestant partie concerning the peace in generall, now treated of in Ireland, and the answers thereunto made in behalfe and name of the Irish nation / by one well affected thereto ; to the first copies whereof many things are inserted and much added.
titleStmt.author: French, Nicholas, 1604-1678.

titleStmt.title: Querees propounded by the Protestant partie concerning the peace in generall, now treated of in Ireland, and the answers thereunto made in behalfe and name of the Irish nation / by one well affected thereto ; to the first copies whereof many things are inserted and much added.
titleStmt.author: French, Nicholas, 1604-1678.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to French by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: cropped and stained with loss of print. Beginning-p. 10 from defective Cambridge University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
